profile.name: Bryson Tang
profile.tagline: Founder, Syntropy Systems | AI Systems Architect | Research Engineer
profile.bio: AI Systems Architect who builds infrastructure for ML at scale and investigates mechanistic interpretability. Designed Kern (525K requests/month event-driven ML service), Crystallize (rigorous experimental framework), and replicated Anthropic's Golden Gate Claude on consumer hardware. Implements from first principles — from sparse autoencoders to production Kafka pipelines. WPI Data Science graduate (3.75 GPA, High Distinction). BlueDot AI Safety Alignment certified.

projects.name: Golden Gate Qwen
projects.description: Minimal replication of Anthropic's Golden Gate Claude on consumer hardware. Trains a Sparse Autoencoder on Qwen2.5-1.5B, discovers interpretable features, and steers model behavior — all on an RTX 3070 Ti.

projects.name: ContextWars
projects.description: Adversarial token convergence experiments on MLX. Pits language models against each other to reveal training strata. Under pressure, models collapse to their most defensible tokens, revealing composition invisible in normal evaluation.

projects.name: AI Safety Compass
projects.description: 70-paper literature review exploring meta-alignment — whether models internalize their lab's safety philosophy. Surveyed 10 frontier models with 40 questions. Interactive tool included.

projects.name: Agent Tokens Protocol
projects.description: A cryptographic protocol for agent provenance. Formalizes identity via digital signatures rather than heuristic detection, applying distributed systems theory to the emerging agent ecosystem.

projects.name: crystallize
projects.description: A framework that makes data science experiments reproducible. Treats each experiment as an immutable record with automatic statistical checks. Long-term goal: infrastructure that lets AI agents run their own experiments.

projects.name: resume-mcp
projects.description: Your identity as an API endpoint. An MCP server that lets AI agents query your professional profile with structured tools instead of scraping HTML.

projects.name: Bloomdesk
projects.description: Addressing the Translation Gap between users and engineers. An intelligent pipeline that converts vague bug reports into structured, high-entropy technical tickets using LLMs.

projects.name: DeltaTask
projects.description: An MCP server that enables AI assistants to manage tasks in Obsidian. Bridges the gap between conversational AI and personal knowledge management.

projects.name: gcomm
projects.description: A Rust CLI for seamless communication with Ollama models. Fast, ergonomic, and designed for developer workflows.

writing.title: Calibration, Not Benchmarking
writing.description: On measuring AI capabilities through calibration rather than benchmarks.

writing.title: Your Prompt's Favorite Prompt
writing.description: LLMs are a megaphone, not a magic wand. Meta-prompting techniques.

writing.title: The Bitter Lesson 2.0: Reasoning Without Worlds
writing.description: Revisiting Rich Sutton's bitter lesson in the age of reasoning models.

writing.title: Circuit Engineers: The Next Frontier of Software
writing.description: How AI is changing the nature of software engineering.

writing.title: The ChatBubble: Stop Bolting. Start Building.
writing.description: Building AI-native products vs bolting AI onto existing ones.

writing.title: Twelve Principles of AI-Native Engineering
writing.description: A manifesto for building software in the age of AI.

writing.title: The Last Illusion is 'As a Large Language Model'
writing.description: On the performative nature of AI disclaimers.

writing.title: The Quiet Pivot of Dr. Seuss
writing.description: Creativity, constraints, and finding your voice.

writing.title: Grain of Thought
writing.description: On the texture and granularity of reasoning.

writing.title: p5.js Recursive Inscriptions Guide
writing.description: How to inscribe generative art onto the Bitcoin blockchain for ~$12.

writing.title: Creating a Nostr Client in TypeScript
writing.description: Building a creative coding platform on the Nostr protocol.

writing.title: Tree of Processing
writing.description: Using recursive logic to generate organic forms in generative art.

highlights: Building AI infrastructure: shared authentication, payments, and LLM tooling across product portfolio
Independent research: replicating Anthropic's Golden Gate Claude on consumer hardware — sparse autoencoders for mechanistic interpretability
Go backend architecture designed to scale with users, not ideas — hosting 100+ products on minimal infrastructure

experience.description: Lead AI architecture for video-based job matching platform processing 100k+ candidate profiles.
highlights: Architected Kern ML infrastructure (525K requests/month): event-driven pipelines, probabilistic classification, embedding systems
Transformed 150k-line legacy codebase into agent-native code (1400 lint → 900 type → 300 tests)
Founded Palmera Labs (internal R&D): RAG systems, agent frameworks, fast-weight plasticity research
Drove 466 merge requests with zero production regressions via automated guardrails

experience.description: Built semantic search and ML infrastructure for job matching platform.
highlights: Achieved sub-1s full-text search across 300k resume chunks via LLM/RAG + MongoDB hybrid filters
Architected Kern ML service: FastAPI intake → Kafka queue → Redis state → NestJS/Pusher delivery
Built universal matching algorithm using triplet loss embeddings + hybrid vector/text search
Created no-code interface enabling non-engineers to deploy Codex-generated branches to production

experience.description: Integrated AI capabilities and managed ML infrastructure.
highlights: Integrated ChatGPT API for automated client workflows, reducing response latency by 60%
Built RAG-powered support desk handling 500+ daily queries with 94% resolution rate
Designed vector-based matching algorithms using MongoDB Atlas Vector Search, improving match accuracy 35%
Managed Apache Airflow pipelines processing 10k+ documents/day with 99.9% data consistency

experience.description: Built cloud infrastructure and led post-acquisition technical integration.
highlights: Engineered AWS infrastructure (ECS, S3) supporting 10k+ DAU with auto-scaling
Architected web platform extending mobile app, increasing user engagement 40%
Led post-acquisition technical integration: unified CI/CD, consolidated 3 codebases into 1

experience.role: Full Stack Engineer / Junior Data Scientist
experience.description: Built data platform and optimized search performance.
highlights: Built Vue.js + Express.js data entry platform from scratch, processing 50k+ records
Reduced Typesense query latency from 4s to 0.4s (10x improvement) via index tuning
Increased data production 125% by implementing work classification specializations

publications.title: AI Safety Compass
publications.description: 70-paper literature review exploring model meta-alignment. Original survey methodology mapping where models sit on alignment/openness axes.

publications.title: Agent Tokens Protocol
publications.description: Open standard for AI agent identity via cryptographic provenance.

publications.title: Project EVE: Novel Launchsondes for Atmospheric Data Collection
publications.description: IEEE Xplore published. Co-author on environmental sensor network paper.
